title: When are the bots be remade again?
body:
I remember many years back when he bots got a complete remake. Harder difficulty, new champs, the bots could have skins, etc.
But that was too long ago. The bots act REEEEALLY stupid nowadays. Beginners I've played with has no problems winning against even the intermediate bots. 
Will they get looked at again? Or will the gamemode just be left in the dust?
